author: James Sandoval
text:
Is anyone aware of professional non-biased consultants who have evaluated Police Officer recruiting? We are trying to determine what factors (beyond just compensation) will enable us to be competitive in recruiting Police Officers in our region.
You can contact Mandy Mills via email at mmills@chulavistaca.gov or at 619-409-5948.
Thank you
title: Evaluation of Competitive Police Recruitment Factors
